ring_guide.title: Ring Mining Reference
ring_guide.subtitle: Click to expand/collapse
ring_guide.res_tip: Mining bonus within 20km of RES beacon. Increases fragments & ore yield.
ring_guide.res_security_info: The security in systems directly affects the expected ship spawn rate and quite possibly the expected bounty amounts as well.
ring_guide.res_security_levels: The three security levels are Low, Medium, and High. Systems that do not have a population will have the system security level of Anarchy.
ring_guide.res_security_tip: For the best possible spawn of wanted ships, High Intensity RES in star systems with high security are the ideal place.

ring_finder.title: Search For Hotspots
ring_finder.search_help: Search covers bubble and import history
ring_finder.no_data_help: 'No data' = Not visited or information not available
ring_finder.any_ring_tooltip: Search for all rings of this type, not just those with known hotspots
ring_finder.any_ring_mode: Any Ring mode: Searching for all rings...
ring_finder.spansh_timeout: Spansh search timed out - try reducing distance
ring_finder.spansh_error: Spansh API error - try again later
ring_finder.no_rings_found_near: No rings found within search criteria for '{system}'
ring_finder.no_material_rings_found_near: No {material} rings found within search criteria for '{system}'
ring_finder.no_rings_found: No rings found within current search parameters
ring_finder.no_material_rings_found: No {material} rings found within current search parameters
ring_finder.search_failed: Search failed - check your search criteria
ring_finder.enter_reference_system: Please enter a reference system or use 'Use Current System'
ring_finder.coords_not_found_warning: Warning: '{system}' coordinates not found - distances may be inaccurate
ring_finder.could_not_detect_system: Could not detect current system - Elite Dangerous not running?
ring_finder.tooltip_ring_type:
Filter by ring type:
- Metallic: Platinum, Gold, Silver
- Icy: LTDs, Tritium, Bromellite
- Rocky: Alexandrite, Benitoite, Opals
- Metal Rich: Painite, Osmium
ring_finder.tooltip_mineral:
Filter by specific material:
Automatically shows only confirmed hotspots
(no theoretical ring data)
ring_finder.tooltip_overlaps:
When checked, only shows rings with known overlaps
(ignores distance limit)
ring_finder.tooltip_res:
When checked, only shows rings with RES sites
(Hazardous, High, Low - ignores distance limit)
ring_finder.auto_switch_tooltip:
Automatically switch tabs based on game state:
- Switch to Mining Session when dropping into a ring
- Switch to Hotspots Finder when entering supercruise or jumping
ring_finder.select_mineral_first: Select a specific mineral first (not 'All Minerals')

sidebar.refinery_note: Note: Contents in Refinery not included in totals
sidebar.limpet_click_help: Tip: Click Limpet to fix count if game file is out of sync

status_bar.total_systems_tooltip: Total systems visited (from game stats). Updates when Elite Dangerous is restarted.
status_bar.click_to_edit_visits: Click to edit visit count for current system

mining_missions.title: Mining Missions
mining_missions.no_missions_hint:
Accept a mining mission in Elite Dangerous
to see it tracked here.
mining_missions.tip_detection:
Tip: Mining missions are detected automatically
when you accept them at a station's Mission Board.

marketplace.enter_system_commodity: Enter system and commodity, then click Search
marketplace.found_stations_top30_price: âœ“ Found {count} stations (showing top 30 by price)
marketplace.found_stations_top30_distance: âœ“ Found {count} stations (showing top 30 with distances)
marketplace.all_fleet_carriers: âš ï¸ Found {count} stations but all are Fleet Carriers. Uncheck 'Exclude Fleet Carriers' to see them.
marketplace.no_match_filters: âš ï¸ Found {count} stations but none match your filters (station type/pad size).
marketplace.searching_buying: ðŸ” Searching for stations buying from...
marketplace.searching_selling: ðŸ” Searching for stations selling to...
marketplace.enter_reference_system: âŒ Please enter a reference system

voiceattack.tip_stop_commands: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Use 'Stop all profile commands' in VoiceAttack to interrupt any active sequence
voiceattack.assign_firegroups: Assign Firegroups (Aâ€“H) and Primary / Secondary Fire Buttons
voiceattack.important_firegroups: âš  Important: Mining automation requires all firegroups (A-H) in-game to be populated - empty groups prevent switching.
voiceattack.tip_core_mining: For core mining, Set Pulse Wave Analyser and Prospector Limpet to the same firegroup with different Fire Buttons.
voiceattack.tip_collector: Set your collector limpets to the same firegroup as your mining lasers and MVR.
voiceattack.tip_clear_jump: "Clear and Jump" clears mass lock then enters supercruise, jumps to selected system, or drop from supercruise.
voiceattack.tip_stop_all: Use "Stop all profile commands" in VoiceAttack to interrupt any active sequence.
voiceattack.timer_laser_first: Duration for firing mining lasers (first period)
voiceattack.timer_pause: Pause between laser periods for weapon recharge/cooldown
voiceattack.timer_laser_extra: Duration for second laser period (If Laser Mining Extra is enabled)
voiceattack.timer_target: Delay before selecting prospector target after laser mining
voiceattack.timer_cargoscoop: Delay before retracting cargo scoop after mining sequence
voiceattack.timer_boost: Boost Interval (For Core Mining Boost sequense )
voiceattack.help_auto_honk: Enable/disable automatic system honk on entering a new system.
voiceattack.help_cargo_scoop: Retracts the cargo scoop when laser mining is completed.
voiceattack.help_headtracker: Enable/disable automatic headtracker docking control (toggles the F9 key).
voiceattack.help_laser_extra: Adds a second period of laser mining after a pause (see Pause timer).
voiceattack.help_night_vision: Automatically turn on night vision when starting or resetting mining sequence.
voiceattack.help_fsd_jump: After FSD jump: open/close system map, then auto-jump (not saved in ship presets)
voiceattack.help_power: Enable = Max power to engines, disable = balance power when laser mining is completed.
voiceattack.help_prospector_sequence: Enable prospector sequence features (master control for Target Prospector and Thrust Up).
voiceattack.help_prospector_sound: Play sound effect when prospector sequence is ready for firing next prospector.
voiceattack.help_target_prospector: Automatically target the prospector after launching it.
voiceattack.help_thrust_up: Apply upward thrust when firing a prospector. Adjust timing in ((Thrust Up)) command in VA Called Commands - Misc category.
voiceattack.help_pulse_wave: Switch back to the Pulse Wave Analyser firegroup when laser mining is completed.
voiceattack.help_target: Deselect prospector when laser mining is completed.
voiceattack.help_timer_laser_first: Duration for firing mining lasers (first period).
voiceattack.help_timer_pause: Pause between laser periods for weapon recharge/cooldown (when Laser Mining Extra is enabled).
voiceattack.help_timer_laser_extra: Duration for second laser period (when Laser Mining Extra is enabled).
voiceattack.help_timer_target: Delay before selecting prospector target after laser mining.
voiceattack.help_timer_cargoscoop: Delay before retracting cargo scoop after mining sequence.
voiceattack.help_timer_boost: Interval between boosts when scanning for cores.
voiceattack.export_instructions:
To preserve your keybinds, first export your CURRENT profile:

1. Open VoiceAttack
2. Right-click your current EliteMining profile
3. Select 'Export Profile'
4. Navigate to:
   {folder}
5. In "Save as type:" select:
   "VoiceAttack Profile Expanded as XML (*.vap)"
6. Save with any filename you prefer
   (Suggested: {filename})

Then click OK and select that file.
voiceattack.no_keybinds_message:
No custom keybinds found in your exported profile.

This is normal if you haven't customized any voice commands.

Import the new profile normally - no keybinds to preserve.
voiceattack.merge_success_message:
âœ… {count} keybinds have been merged into the new profile!

Now import the updated profile into VoiceAttack:

1. Open VoiceAttack
2. Click 'Import Profile'
3. Select:
   {path}

Your keybinds are now preserved in the new profile.

Optional cleanup (after successful import):
â€¢ Delete the old profile inside VoiceAttack
â€¢ Delete old profile file(s) from the EliteMining folder
  (e.g., EliteMining-Profile.vap or old versioned profiles)

bookmarks.title: Mining Bookmarks
bookmarks.dialog_help: T/hr (tons per hour) represents a single session's mining rate. For accurate location assessment, mine the location multiple times and update this value with your observed average rate.
bookmarks.error_required_fields: System and Body/Ring are required fields

Refinery capacity is 10t maximum.
Current: {current}t
Available: {available}t
Cannot add {amount}t

settings.core_asteroids_help: Speak only when a core (motherlode) is detected.
settings.select_minerals: Select minerals and set minimum percentages:
settings.tooltips_desc: Show helpful tooltips when hovering over buttons and controls
settings.stay_on_top_desc: Keep application window always on top of other windows
settings.send_eddn_desc: Share market data with the Elite Dangerous community via EDDN (Elite Dangerous Data Network)
settings.text_overlay_desc: Announcements text overlay (same text that goes to TTS)
settings.text_color_desc: Select text color for announcement overlay
settings.display_duration_desc: How long text stays on screen (in seconds)
settings.tts_desc: Read prospector data and announcements aloud
settings.tts_config_desc: Configure Text-to-Speech voice and volume for announcements
settings.journal_desc: Location of Elite Dangerous journal files
settings.restart_required_msg: This change requires a restart to take effect.
settings.restart_message: Please restart EliteMining to apply changes.
settings.restart_now_prompt: Would you like to restart EliteMining now?
settings.choose_language_desc: Choose app language or auto-detect from Elite Dangerous game settings
settings.text_size_desc: Choose text size for better readability
settings.overlay_mode_desc: Standard: Simple text (only when announced) | Enhanced: Game-style display (every prospector fire)
settings.duration_desc: How long text stays visible on screen (5-30 seconds)
settings.auto_scan_desc: Automatically check for new mining data in Elite Dangerous journals when the app starts. Disable if you prefer manual imports via Settings â†’ Import History
settings.ask_import_prompt: Ask to import history when changing journal folder
settings.screenshots_folder_desc: Default folder for selecting screenshots when adding them to reports
settings.api_coming_soon: COMING SOON - Server Infrastructure In Development
settings.api_coming_soon_desc1: The API upload feature is currently under development. Server-side infrastructure
settings.api_coming_soon_desc2: is being built to receive and process mining data. This feature will be enabled
settings.api_coming_soon_desc3: in a future release. Stay tuned!
settings.api_consent_title: By enabling, you agree to share:
settings.api_desc: Share mining data with the community for aggregation and analytics
settings.backup_restore_desc: Backup and restore ship presets, reports, and bookmarks
settings.updates_desc: Check GitHub for newer versions of EliteMining

tooltips.hit_rate: Percentage of asteroids meeting your threshold
tooltips.announcement_threshold: Set the minimum percentage threshold for announcements
tooltips.set_all_threshold: Set all materials to the minimum threshold percentage
tooltips.fix_tts:
Reinitialize Text-to-Speech engine.
Use this if TTS stops working or after recycling Windows voices.
tooltips.journal_folder:
Select the Elite Dangerous Journal folder
Usually located in: Documents\Frontier Developments\Elite Dangerous
tooltips.import_history: Import visited systems and hotspots from existing journal files
tooltips.screenshots_folder:
Select the default folder for importing screenshots
Usually located in: Documents\Pictures
tooltips.test_upload: Not available - server infrastructure in development
tooltips.bulk_upload: Not available - server infrastructure in development
tooltips.backup:
Create backup of Ship Presets, Reports, Bookmarks, and VoiceAttack Profile
Backup is saved as a timestamped zip file
tooltips.restore:
Restore from backup zip file
Select which data to restore and handle conflicts
tooltips.import_va:
Read VoiceAttack settings from game files
(Firegroups, Mining Controls, Announcements)
tooltips.apply_va:
Save settings to VoiceAttack variable files
Press after:
â€¢ Selecting a Ship Preset
â€¢ Changing any settings in Mining Controls or Firegroups tab
tooltips.current_system: Your current system (updates automatically on FSD jump)
tooltips.home_system: Type system name and press Enter to save
tooltips.fleet_carrier: Auto-detected from journals on app start and after FC jumps
tooltips.refresh_locations: Scan journal files to update current system and fleet carrier location
tooltips.use_current: Fill with your current system from journals
tooltips.use_fc: Fill with your Fleet Carrier location
tooltips.calculate_distance: Calculate distances between systems (or press Enter)
tooltips.edsm_status:
EDSM API status indicator
ðŸŸ¢ Online: API responding normally
ðŸŸ¡ Slow: API responding with errors
ðŸ”´ Offline: API not responding
tooltips.eddata_status:
EDDATA API status indicator
ðŸŸ¢ Online: Primary API (EDData) responding
ðŸŸ¡ Fallback: Using Ardent API (EDData offline)
ðŸ”´ Offline: Both APIs not responding
tooltips.about: Click for app info, links, and credits
tooltips.near_system_search: Search within 500 LY of reference system - returns all matching stations in range
tooltips.galaxy_wide_search: Show top 30 from best 100 prices galaxy-wide - station filters apply after fetching top 100
tooltips.sell_mode: Search for stations buying this commodity (where you can sell)
tooltips.buy_mode: Search for stations selling this commodity (where you can buy)
tooltips.station_type_filter: Filter by station type: Orbital, Surface, Fleet Carrier, Megaship, or Stronghold
tooltips.exclude_carriers: Exclude Fleet Carriers from search results
tooltips.large_pads: Show only stations with Large landing pads
tooltips.sort_by: Sort results by price, distance, supply/demand, or data freshness
tooltips.max_age: Filter by how recent the market data is
tooltips.reference_system: Enter reference system for distance-based search
tooltips.min_hotspots:
Minimum hotspot count filter
Only shows rings with X or more hotspots
(Only active when specific mineral is selected)
tooltips.max_distance:
Maximum search radius in light years
Recommended: 10-50 LY for better performance
Larger distances may take longer to search
tooltips.system_entry: Current system name. (Can also be entered manually)
tooltips.body_entry: Current location: rings, planets, stations, or carriers. (Can also be entered manually)
tooltips.start_session: Start a new mining session to track materials and performance
tooltips.pause_session: Pause or resume the current mining session
tooltips.stop_session: End the session and generate a final report
tooltips.cancel_session: Cancel the current session without saving
tooltips.auto_start:
Automatically start session when first prospector limpet is fired
(Only works when no session is active)
tooltips.prompt_full:
Show prompt to end session when cargo is 100% full
and has been idle (no changes) for 1 minute
Remember to end session BEFORE unloading cargo!
tooltips.multi_session:
Accumulate statistics across multiple cargo loads
Stats won't reset until you manually end the session
tooltips.cargo_full_message: Your cargo is {percent}% full and has been idle for {minutes} minute.
tooltips.cargo_full_question: Do you want to end the current mining session?
tooltips.cargo_full_warning:
âš ï¸ Important: End session BEFORE unloading cargo
to preserve data for the report.
tooltips.rebuild_csv: Rebuild the CSV index from all text files in the reports folder. Use this if data doesn't match between the table and files.
tooltips.open_folder: Open the reports folder in Windows Explorer to browse all session files.
tooltips.export_csv: Export session data to a CSV file that can be opened in Excel or other spreadsheet programs.
tooltips.batch_reports: Generate enhanced HTML reports for multiple sessions at once.
tooltips.discord_share: Share selected mining session report to Discord via webhook
tooltips.mining_card: Generate visual mining card (PNG) from selected session report
tooltips.date_filter: Filter sessions by date, yield performance, hit rate, or materials
tooltips.bookmark_search: Search bookmarks by system, body, or materials
tooltips.bookmark_avg_yield: Mining rate (tons per hour) from a single session. Mine location multiple times for accurate assessment.
tooltips.add_bookmark: Add a new mining location bookmark
tooltips.delete_bookmark: Delete the selected bookmark(s) - use Ctrl+click or Shift+click to select multiple
tooltips.preset_load_save:
Left-click to load preset {num} announcement settings
Right-click to save current settings as preset {num}
tooltips.prospector_minerals: Minerals found in this asteroid with their percentages
tooltips.prospector_content: Material content quality and remaining percentage
tooltips.prospector_time: Time when this asteroid was scanned
tooltips.reports_datetime: Date and time when the mining session ended
tooltips.reports_duration: Total duration of the mining session
tooltips.reports_ship: Ship name, type, and identifier used for mining
tooltips.reports_system: Star system where mining took place
tooltips.reports_body: Planet, ring, or celestial body that was mined
tooltips.reports_asteroids: Total asteroids scanned during the session
tooltips.reports_minerals: Number of different mineral types found within the threshold set in announcement panel
tooltips.reports_hits: Total Material Hits â€” number of asteroids that contained the tracked materials
tooltips.reports_hitrate: Percentage of asteroids that had valuable minerals (Hit Rate %)
tooltips.reports_yield: Average quality/yield percentage of minerals found
tooltips.reports_minerals_detail: Minerals mined with quantities and individual yields
tooltips.reports_limpets: Number of prospector limpets used during mining session
tooltips.reports_engineering: Engineering materials collected during the session
tooltips.mineral_name:
Material name with your announcement threshold
Example: Platinum (27%) means you're only alerted when
asteroids have 27% or higher Platinum content
tooltips.mineral_tons: Total tons of this material collected this session
tooltips.mineral_tph: Mining rate: Tons per hour for this material
tooltips.mineral_tpa: Average tons collected per asteroid for this material
tooltips.mineral_avg_all:
Average % across ALL asteroids you prospected
(includes low-quality asteroids below threshold)
tooltips.mineral_avg_thr:
Average % only for asteroids AT OR ABOVE threshold
(your quality finds that triggered announcements)
tooltips.mineral_best: Highest % found this session for this material
tooltips.mineral_current: Most recent prospector scan result for this material
tooltips.mineral_hits:
Number of hits that met your threshold
(quality finds that triggered announcements)
tooltips.chart_refresh: Manually refresh charts with latest mining data
tooltips.chart_auto_refresh: Automatically update charts as new data arrives

system_finder.no_filter_results: No matches in nearby 500 systems. Try Inara for wider search.
